about_the_game:
Story

The paper fairy Pepa lived harmoniously with the book fairy Lex.

However, one day, the scissor fairy Slash intruded into their home and snatched away pages from Lex's book.

Deprived of strength, Lex returned to being a silent book.
To reclaim the stolen pages, Pepa rises to the occasion.

Using the power to manipulate paper freely, Pepa embarks on a journey to the scissor fairy's lair, overcoming various challenges along the way.

About this game

Pepa's Adventure is a point-and-click picture book made with papercut art.
The story unfolds through pictures alone, progressing the narrative without words.

Characters and backgrounds are crafted from handmade papercut art.

Embark on an adventure with Pepa, meeting the enchanting inhabitants of the papercut world along the way.

One day, scissor fairy Slash cut and stole his pages. Pepa embarks on an adventure to recover stolen pages.
